text: Moshi kare-ra 2-ri ga (gisho no) tsumi ni atai suru koto ga hanmei shitanaraba, kare-ra ni yotte furieki o kabutta-sha no naka kara (shisha ni) en no mottomo chikai tekisetsuna 2-ri no jinbutsu o arata ni shogen ni tata se, arra ni kakete chikawa se nasai. `Watashi-tachi no shogen wa, hontoni 2-ri no shogen yori mo shinjitsudearimasu. Watashi-tachi wa kesshite (tsumi o) okashita koto wa arimasen. Sodeareba, watashi-tachi wa hontoni fugimonodearimasu
